alert.note: Alert for Clark; Scotland (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 14 at 12:54PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Elevated Fire Danger and Gusty Winds This Afternoon... West winds will increase this afternoon with peak gusts of 35 to 45 mph between 2 PM and 6 PM. The highest winds are expected south of Interstate 80. The combination of strong winds, low relative humidity between 20 to 30 percent, and cured agricultural fields will lead to a high fire danger. If a fire were to ignite in this environment, it would spread quickly and be difficult to control. Outdoor burning is strongly discouraged and farmers are urged to be cautious during harvest activities. Gusty winds may also blow around unsecured objects, such as Halloween decorations, and make driving high profile vehicles difficult.
